name: The Overflow
title: Candace: The Overflow
desc: Those who do not respect the regulations at cards...\nAre the enemy of all who love the game.
inPlayDescription: When this card is equipped by Candace, her <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Prayer of the Crimson Crown has the following extra effect: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">After your character uses a Normal Attack: Deals 1 <span style="color:#80C0FFFF">Hydro DMG. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Candace to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Candace is your active character, equip this card.After Candace equips this card, she will immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide once.When this card is equipped by Candace, her <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Prayer of the Crimson Crown has the following extra effect: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">After your character uses a Normal Attack: Deals 1 <span style="color:#80C0FFFF">Hydro DMG. (Once per Round)(You must have Candace in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
